properties.name: duration
properties.summary: Determines how long the notification stays on screen.

properties.name: gravity
properties.summary: Determines the location at which the notification should appear on the screen.

properties.name: horizontalMargin
properties.summary: Horizontal placement of the notification, as a fraction of the screen width.
properties.description: Useful values range from -0.5 (far left) to 0.5 (far right). A value of zero indicates default placement.

properties.name: verticalMargin
properties.summary: Vertical placement of the notifcation, as a fraction of the screen height.
properties.description: Useful values range from -0.5 (top) to 0.5 (bottom). A value of zero indicates default placement.

properties.name: xOffset
properties.summary: X offset from the default position, in pixels.

properties.name: yOffset
properties.summary: Y offset from the default position, in pixels.
